lamp|(n)|đèn|Ví dụ:|He uses a table lamp to study.
pillowcase|(n)|áo gối, bao gối|Ví dụ:|A pillow goes inside a pillowcase.
curtain|(n)|tầm rèm che|Ví dụ:|He accidentally tears the shower curtain.
bed|(n)|cái giường|Ví dụ:|This is a single bed.
mirror|(n)|chiếc gương, kiếng|Ví dụ:|We ever had a big mirror on the wall.
cushion|(n)|đệm ngồi|Ví dụ:|She sank back into the cushions.
wardrobe|(n)|tủ đứng|Ví dụ:|She was showing me her new built-in wardrobes.
fitted carpet|(n)|thảm lót sàn (vừa khít phòng)|Ví dụ:|We have an affordable range of fitted carpets to suit your flooring needs.
dressing table|(n)|bàn trang điểm|Ví dụ:|She sat at the dressing table while combing her hair.
wallpaper|(n)|giấy dán tường|Ví dụ:|We'll need some wallpaper ​for bedroom.
pillow|(n)|gối ngủ|Ví dụ:|I want one more pillow, please.
carpet|(n)|tấm thảm|Ví dụ:|These carpets are good.
blind|(n)|bức màn che; mành mành, rèm|Ví dụ:|I could see something through the blinds.
mattress|(n)|nệm|Ví dụ:|This mattress looks firm.
bedspread|(n)|khăn trải giường|Ví dụ:|This bedspread is colorful.
blanket|(n)|chăn|Ví dụ:|Thanks to the soft and cozy blanket, he had a very sound sleep last night.
jewellery|(n)|đồ trang sức, đồ nữ trang|Ví dụ:|I buy a jewellery for my girlfriend in her birthday.
alarm clock|(n)|đồng hồ báo thức|Ví dụ:|I always set the alarm clock at 7 A.M.
air conditioner|(n)|máy điều hòa|Ví dụ:|My company has just installed an air conditioner.
box spring|(n)|khung lò xo nâng nệm|Ví dụ:|The box spring is so good.
comforter|(n)|chăn lông|Ví dụ:|If you order you will receive a pink comforter.
hanger|(n)|giá treo|Ví dụ:|I will hang dried clothes up on the hanger.
closet|(n)|tủ quần áo (âm tường)|Ví dụ:|My closet is covered in dirt.
comb|(n)|cái lược|Ví dụ:|This comb is used for my cat.
lightswitch|(n)|công tắc điện|Ví dụ:|I can't see the lightswitch in the dark room.
chest of drawers|(n)|tủ đựng nhiều ngăn (đựng quần áo)|Ví dụ:|This chest of drawers is so good and cheap.
